Articles.Content:
Try to get to the mun with these parts:

Sepatrons

Decouplers(any/all)

Any structural components

NO wings.

SAS modules(Inline Stabilizer)

Batteries

LV-1 series items are fine

Round-8 or Oscar B fuel tanks can ONLY be used.

Mk1 or Mk1-2 pods can be used.

Any solar panels

Parachutes are okay

RCS CAN be used(that includes RCS tanks)

Landing legs are optional

Ion related things are also allowed.

Anyone up for the challenge?

Edited January 12, 2014 by Yoshidude
Well partially I got into orbit but I'm sure you can get to the moon

The title doesn't really summarise what you're asking here That list of parts is considerably more than a "few more parts" than decouplers and seperatrons.

When you say "ONE SAS module" does that mean the rocket has to have one?
